question: Which chapter details the functions and powers of the Unique Identification Authority of India constituted under Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery of Financial and other Subsidies, benefits and services) Act, 2016 ?
explanation: The chapter IV details the functions and powers of the Unique Identification Authority of India constituted under Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery of Financial and other Subsidies, benefits and services) Act, 2016.
